data.fullContent: Sean is a manager at a building where older people live. There are nurses and doctors there for the people who are ill. All the meals are made for the folks who live there, and somebody does all their laundry. All the people who live there work in a shared garden on the weekends.
data.answer: 肖恩是老年人居住的大楼的经理。那里有护士和医生为生病的人服务。所有的饭菜都是为住在那里的人准备的，还有人帮他们洗衣服。所有住在那里的人在周末都在一个共享的花园工作。
